name: Adventurer
bonus4: Opening chest regenerates 30% Max HP over 5s.

name: Lucky Dog
bonus4: Picking up Mora restores 300 HP.

name: Traveling Doctor
bonus4: Using Elemental Burst restores 20% HP.

name: Instructor
bonus4: After using Elemental Skill, increases all party members' Elemental Mastery by 120 for 8s.

name: Berserker
bonus4: When HP is below 70%, CRIT Rate increases by an additional 24%.

name: The Exile
bonus4: Using an Elemental Burst regenerates 2 Energy for other party members every 2s for 6s. This effect cannot stack.

name: Resolution of Sojourner
bonus4: Increases Charged Attack CRIT Rate by 30%.

name: Martial Artist
bonus2: Increases Normal Attack and Charged Attack DMG by 15%.
bonus4: After using Elemental Skill, increases Normal Attack and Charged Attack DMG by 25% for 8s.

name: Defender's Will
bonus4: Increases Elemental RES by 30% for each element present in the party.

name: Tiny Miracle
bonus4: Incoming elemental DMG increases corresponding Elemental RES by 30% for 10s. Can only occur once every 10s.

name: Heart of Bravery
bonus4: Increases DMG by 30% against enemies with more than 50% HP.

name: Gambler
bonus4: Defeating an enemy has 100% chance to remove Elemental Skill CD. Can only occur once every 15s.

name: Scholar
bonus4: Gaining Energy gives 3 Energy to all party members who have a bow or a catalyst equipped. Can only occurs once every 3s.

name: Gladiator's Finale
bonus4: If the wielder of this artifact set uses a Sword, Claymore or Polearm, increases their Normal Attack DMG by 35%.

name: Maiden Beloved
bonus4: Using an Elemental Skill or Burst increases healing received by all party members by 20% for 10s.

name: Noblesse Oblige
bonus4: Using an Elemental Burst increases all party members' ATK by 20% for 12s. This effect cannot stack.

name: Bloodstained Chivalry
bonus4: After defeating an opponent, increases Charged Attack DMG by 50%, and reduces its Stamina cost to 0 for 10s.

name: Wanderer's Troupe
bonus4: Increases Charged Attack DMG by 35% if the character uses a Catalyst or Bow.

name: Viridescent Venerer
bonus4: Increases Swirl DMG by 60%. Decreases opponent's Elemental RES to the element infused in the Swirl by 40% for 10s.

name: Thundering Fury
bonus4: Increases damage caused by Overloaded, Electro-Charged, and Superconduct DMG by 40%. Triggering such effects decreases Elemental Skill CD by 1s. Can only occur once every 0.8s.

name: Thundersoother
bonus4: Increases DMG against enemies affected by Electro by 35%.

name: Crimson Witch of Flames
bonus4: Increases Overloaded and Burning DMG by 40%. Increases Vaporize and Melt DMG by 15%. Using an Elemental Skill increases 2-Piece Set effects by 50% for 10s. Max 3 stacks.

name: Lavawalker
bonus4: Increases DMG against enemies that are Burning or affected by Pyro by 35%.

name: Glacier and Snowfield
bonus4: Increases Superconduct DMG by 50%. Increases Melt DMG by 15%. Using an Elemental Burst increases Cryo DMG by 25% for 10s.

name: Icebreaker
bonus4: Increases DMG against enemies in a Frozen state or affected by cryo by 35%.

name: Archaic Petra
bonus4: Upon obtaining a crystal created through a Geo Elemental Reaction, all party members gain 35% Elemental DMG Bonus to that particular element for 10s. Only one form of Elemental DMG Bonus can be gained in this manner at any one time. (the in-game description is incorrect)[1]

name: Retracing Bolide
bonus2: Increases the effectiveness of shields by 35%
bonus4: Gain an additional 40% Normal and Charged Attack DMG while under the protection of a shield.
